title: Flight Simulator 2020 - POI's - Italy - Statua Del Redentore
description:
In this video we will fly over the Statua Del Redentore. The Statue of Christ the Redeemer of Maratea (Italian: Cristo Redentore di Maratea) is a statue of Jesus Christ in Maratea, southern Italy, realized in Carrara marble on the top of the Mountain â€œSt. Biagio".

The sculpture was created by the Florentine sculptor Bruno Innocenti. The entire Statue was completed in 1965.

The idea to realize the Statue was the Count Stefano Rivetti of Valcervoâ€™s, who was also the promoter and financier of the project execution.
